name: Advanced Dungeons & Dragons: Hillsfar
overview:
Direct your charger into the walled city of Hillsfar for fast
battle action and challenging fantasy adventure! Hillsfar has
been invaded by Maalthir, the self-proclaimed First Lord,
who rules the region with his powerful magic and his
ruthless guards, the Red Plumes. In the AD&D® game
tradition, you must make many choices in the roles you play.
Each profession has its own missions. Intelligence must
guide your characters with dexterity and charm to battle
minotaurs, orcs and armed guards; test your skills in the
gladiators' coliseum or archery range.

• Based on an internationally-known PC game
• Exciting on-screen action in the AD&D®
game tradition that FCI helped define
• Players create and name human and
non-human characters with choice
of gender, race and skills
• More than 2 megabits of memory; long
life lithium battery saves play positions
